Hetu
Hetuduka, Tika
Hetuduka, Dassanenapahātabbahetukattika
Nevadassanenanabhāvanāyapahātabbahetukapada
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Hetu
298.
608Hetuṃ nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
299.
609Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava…pe…  avigate nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
